com.vtls.opensource.text
Class XMLTextSourceExtractionHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      com.vtls.opensource.text.XMLTextSourceExtractionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class XMLTextSourceExtractionHandler
extends DefaultHandler

SAX handler that just keeps the text content from an XML document.
